dmca.title: dmca\phising
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Coy, Devon [mailto:Devon_Coy@cable.comcast.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 17, 2007 1:04 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: dmca\phising



To Whom It May Concern:

 

It appears that one of your subscribers is in violation of DMCA
(copyright infringement). We want to take legal action against this
individual so we would appreciate you harvesting the information from
this site and restricting access to the data. We need our data off the
internet as we pursue legal actions. A link of the data in question is
listed below. Most importantly a copy of our TSTools is available for
all to see, if it is at all possible. Please restrict access or
completely remove "TWCSOLUTIONS<DIR> I think this is Julio Gonzalez's
server as I browsed one of .html files and it was from a gaming clan
that had him listed. There are images of this individual on the site as
well, which is incriminating.

 

Please have this account disabled or remove the TWCSOLUTIONS <DIR>.

 

PS: I left a message on this voicemail as well, awaiting a response
(Telephone: 713-400-5400). My contact information is listed below

 

http://69.56.133.239/TWCSolutions/tstool/supervisors.html

 

http://69.56.133.239/TWCSolutions/tstool/

 

http://69.56.133.239/Baiter/SelfPics/Me_and_Shannon.jpg
